text.text:
Hello.
Last night account @honestpeople.by was blocked. It‚Äôs very important Belarusian initiative, but now they can‚Äôt add text to own publications.  As far as they are helping victims of Belarusian ex-president‚Äôs repression, I am deeply concerned if the restrictions for the account aren‚Äôt made in order to support crime political regime. 
Activities of this community are very important for Belarusians and their rights.  They fighting to bring Law and Justice back to citizens. There are not so many free media in Belarus, so spreading truthful information is very important mission for social media.
Please help to unblock  @honestpeople.by!
